thread.section_title: The Soho Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One word fantastic
thread.title_full: One word fantastic - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: wallyspain
title: One word fantastic
text: I stayed in The Soho Hotel over the weekend with my fiancee. Even before arriving Sandro the concierge was very helpful in booking restaurants and a private tour guide from Britishtours ( which in itself was great as well) The service, the room, the location, all was fantastic. On my next visit too London I will definitely be back.
